results.name: Mind Your Step (Fontys Game Design & Technology)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: IntelR Core2 Duo or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any Bord can apply OpenGLR
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
